title: Stop Child Sacrifice Today!
content:
U-reporters confirmed that child sacrifice is happening in every district in Uganda. Each week, mostly children aged 3-18 are targeted for child sacrifice. Therefore, Guardians need to be very responsible for their children, especially when in public places. If you know any one whose family has experienced child sacrifice in the community, report the incidence;

 1. Report to the LC1 Chair person or Vice Chair person who is responsible for Children’s Affairs at Community level, you.  
 2. At Sub County level the Family and Child protection Officer in Police though most districts have this unit at District level (So any police officer present can be reported to).  
 3. You can call toll free Child helpline 116   
 4. Send a message to 8500
 5. You can also report to the Probation and Welfare Officer at the District who is the technical officer responsible for all Children’s affairs.
